hadiths.text: Thabit said:“We were sitting with Anas bin Mahk, and a daughter of his was with him. Anas said: 'A woman came to the Prophet and offered herself to him. She said: " O Messenger of Allah, do you have any need of me?"' His daughter said: 'How little modesty she had!' He said: 'She was better than you, because she wanted (to marry) the Messenger of Allah, and she offered herself to him

chapter.ara-name: باب الَّتِي وَهَبَتْ نَفْسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The woman who offered herself (in marriage) to the Prophet (ﷺ)
